text: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

translation.en: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you, [O Muhammad], in truth. And indeed, you are from among the messengers
translation.id: Itulah ayat-ayat Allah, Kami bacakan kepadamu dengan benar dan engkau (Muhammad) adalah benar-benar seorang rasul
